children.text:
Welcome to this new version of GPS Essentials!

New in 4.4.12:

Unfortunately, MapQuest has discontinued their map server. You can still select MapQuest as a map, but no new map tiles will load. Selecting MapQuest maps is only useful to show map tiles that are already loaded on your device. 

New in 4.4.11:

Fixed crash in dashboard. 

Share all images at once in picture gallery. 

Fixed chart by time. 

New in 4.4.10:

Fixed transition animations. 

New in 4.4.9:

Improved performance of map and picture views, reduced flicker. 

"None" geocoder. 

New in 4.4.8:

Bugfixes in web view. 

Fixed GPX import. 

New in 4.4.7:

Fixed northing and easting signs. 

New in 4.4.6:

Improved database performance 

New in 4.4.5:

Fixed delete already deleted node in portable maps 

Added side menu to start screen 

Fixed trip widget not updating 

New in 4.4.4:

Fixed dashboard animations 

Fixed dashboard value updates for added widgets 

Fixed time widget default format 

New in 4.4.3:

Fixed edit style color buttons 

New in 4.4.2:

Fixed dashboard widget sizes 

New in 4.4.1:

Bugfixes 

New in 4.4.0:

Releasing 4.3 to production 

New in 4.3.17:

Fallback to lowres tiles in Portable Maps 

New in 4.3.16:

Fixed dialog styles 

Fixed camera orientation on some devices 

New in 4.3.15:

Fixed import of shared stream 

Default clamp heading is 'when moving' now 

New option 'when plugged' for keep screen on setting 

New in 4.3.14:

Fixed proximity alert showing when alert is off 

New in 4.3.12,13:

Bugfixes 

New in 4.3.11:

Fixed Directions API 

New in 4.3.10:

Bugfixes 

New in 4.3.9:

Google Elevation API 

New in 4.3.8:

KMZ export 

Selectable storage location: If you upgraded from a previous version, your storage location will remain the same. For new installations, it will be external app storage (erased on uninstall). You can change the storage location in settings 

New permission model for Android Marshmallow and later 

Google Directions API 

New in 4.3.7:

Alarm dismiss dialog 

New in 4.3.6:

Fixed wearable dashboard theme 

New in 4.3.5:

Improved network performance 

New in 4.3.4:

GPX speed import 

New in 4.3.3:

Wearable dashboard and ambient mode 

New in 4.3.2:

Bugfixes. 

New in 4.3.1:

Fixed aspects in portable maps 

New in 4.3.0:

Material Design 

New in 4.2.27:

Fixed compass showing erratic mesures when lying flat 

Fixed KML hotspot element 

New in 4.2.25:

Fixed add waypoint not starting GPS 

New in 4.2.24:

Added floating action button 

Fixed widget configuration dialogs only showing in action mode 

Added Google Maps custom my location, fixed color 

KML export exclude trash folder 

Fixed Google Map orientation change issue 

New in 4.2.23:

Fixed add and stop in compass view 

Fixed crash in satellite view 

New in 4.2.22:

Fixed ISO8601 milliseconds in exports and imports 

Fixed GPS not switching on in satellite and dashboard view 

New in 4.2.21:

Added maps: Stamen watercolor and Stamen toner 

Fixed compass tracking angle adjustment 

Fixed create directions without stream 

New in 4.2.20:

Fixed Stamen terrain map 

Fixed dial menu collapse when tap outside 

New in 4.2.19:

Fixed help links 

Refactored X509 certificates 

New in 4.2.18:

Fixed missing pressure sensor showing 0 

New in 4.2.17:

Added Google Analytics 

Fixed layout on wide screens 

New in 4.2.16:

Fixed open geo: url 

New in 4.2.15:

Added Mapquest Elevation API ('Get Elevation' in edit waypoint, 'Fill Elevation' in stream list) 

New in 4.2.14:

Fixed Mapquest API (Geocoder, Directions) 

New in 4.2.13:

Fixed synchronization performance 

Fixed change access of shared stream caused stream duplication 

New in 4.2.12:

New widgets: Illuminance, Proximity, Air Pressure, Pressure Altitude (tap to configure QNH) 

Wearable app (Add waypoint, start/stop tracking) 

Database profiler and logger 

New in 4.2.11:

Custom datum script API 

Fixed script error handling 

Fixed database missing index 

New in 4.2.9:

Script editor 

Fixed map polyline labels scaling 

Fixed stream loading while rendering 

New in 4.2.8:

Show compass calibration warning in compass view 

Change widget size and theme in action mode menu 

Lock dashboard in action mode menu 

Scripting API 

New in 4.2.7:

New my location icon types in Portable Maps 

Picture gallery has navigation drawer 

Fixed GPX export generating invalid data (in element) 

GPX prevent export of trash category 

New in 4.2.6:

Fixed crash on tablets 

New in 4.2.5:

Fixed tracking stream not showing by default 

Fixed open stream from URL 

KML description and name tags support simple HTML now 

Fixed KML StyleMap with embedded Style element 

Added Fire Phone home folder support 

New in 4.2.4:

Fixed out of memory when rendering map card on some older devices 

New in 4.2.3:

Fixed KML line color 

New in 4.2.2:

Added compass light theme 

Google Maps keeps properties now 

Fixed empty picture gallery 

Fixed auto pan lost when opening stream map 

New in 4.2.1:

Added embedded navigation on wide screens (>=800dp) 

Fixed google maps zoom to stream when opening from map card 

Improved database performance: Added transaction to fixDistanceAndGain and removeOrphanedBlobs, added index BinaryContentHashIndex 

Use NPOT textures on supporting devices 

New in 4.2.0:

Fixed landscape compass layout 

New in 4.1.4:

Fixed external search 

New in 4.1.3:

Added Mapquest geocoder (for map search), configurable 

Added new landscape stream list layout for large screens 

Fixed stream list not showing after orientation change 

Fixed portrait compass layout 

New in 4.1.2:

Improved navigation drawer: Secondary views can go back now 

Fixed OpenGL crash on older hardware 

New in 4.1.1:

Fixed direct import from GMail and Google Drive (and hopefully a few other apps) 

New in 4.1.0:

Upgraded to OpenGL ES 2 

New in 4.0.43:

Removed Google Maps import because Google discontinued KML support in Google Maps. 

Zoom all in portable maps. 

Backup of settings (using Android Backup Manager). 

New in 4.0.41:

Expandable waypoint in portable maps, double tap on waypoint to toggle. 

Fixed KMZ import. 

New in 4.0.40:

Added single waypoints in add dialog in stream view. 

Added support for LOC file format. 

New in 4.0.39:

Added fill-in flash mode for supporting devices. 

New in 4.0.37:

Fixed autofocus, added focus sound. 

New in 4.0.36:

Tiled image overlays for bigger sized overlays. 

New in 4.0.35:

Fixed auto pan in Google Maps 

Added replay buttons in track info 

New in 4.0.34:

Fixed retain map on rotate screen. 

New in 4.0.33:

Fixed KMZ custom icons not showing. 

Fixed orientation change in create route losing nodes. 

Fixed content type of resurrected pictures from image folder. 

New in 4.0.32:

Adjust Horizon in picture view fixes rolled pictures. 

New in 4.0.31:

Fixed search, create waypoint in Google Maps. 

New in 4.0.29:

Picture gallery portrait mode, immersive mode (double tap). 

New in 4.0.27:

Add locations from coordinates (add the Post card). 

Fixed zoom stream excludes nodes without location. 

New in 4.0.25:

Area calculation (add the Area card). Fixed chart view. 

New in 4.0.21:

Fixed Google Maps landscape view. 

Fixed picture view crash on some devices. 

Fixed geocoding character encoding. 

New in 4.0.20:

Google Maps v2 support, Google Play Services required. 

New in 4.0.16:

Duplicate Stream 

New in 4.0.15:

Bugfixes 

New in 4.0.13:

Fixed a bug in GPX export 

Fixed dark theme issues 

New in 4.0.12:

Added dial menu long timeout for some actions (e.g. zoom) 

GPS deserialiser respects document order 

Fixed track live view in Google Maps 

Fixed dark theme issues 

New in 4.0.11:

Fixed Geo URI with multiline queries and FC in Google Maps 

Fixed help broken links 

Larger dial menu 

Compass in dial menu 

New in 4.0.10:

Camera HUD shows starred and current stream now 

Fixed spontaneously collapsing dial menu 

New in 4.0.8:

Added MultiGeometry in KML import 

Fixed picture view pan and zoom 

Fixed ETA >1d 

Split view works on long tap now 

New in 4.0.7:

Action modes in stream list and stream view: Long tap on an element activates action menu. 

Added vector to current target on map when routing. 

Navigate in map view and stream action menu starts navigation to this waypoint in the waypoint's current stream, no need to create a new stream or category for single waypoint navigation. 

New in 4.0.5:

XTD: Cross Track Distance is a new value in dashboard. 

Start route now picks up the route at the nearest leg, not the first leg. 

Zoom leg in Portable Maps to zoom the area covering your current location and the target. 

New in 4.0.4:

Single picture view with pan and zoom. Pictures rotate automatically in gallery and picture view. 

New in 4.0.3:

A totally revamped data model. See Data Model for more details. 

All data can be shared. See Sharing for more details. 

Improved export and import: KMZ import, support for KML folders, polylines, polygons (no fill) and ground overlays. 

Custom icons: Import a KMZ file with icons adds these to the icon gallery. 

Themes: Change between dark and light theme in settings. 

Styles: Set the line color for tracks, routes and cursors in settings. Set colors individually for every category. 

Google Maps: The route controls have been removed, add the route control widget instead. 

New in 3.2.11:

Added TalkBack info to compass and dashboard view. 

Added Multi Window support for Samsung devices. 

New in 3.2.10:

Fixed waypoint alignment in camera HUD. 

New in 3.2.9:

File picker in import and export dialogs. 

New in 3.2.8:

Track list is sorted latest tracks first. 

Fixed waypoint list: Sort by distance when moving. 

Added waypoint location to tag list. 

New in 3.2.6:

Audio out for compass. 

New widget: Route control switches the target in a running route. 

New in 3.2.5:

Switch unit of angle between mils and degrees. 

New in 3.2.0:

Fixed compass orientation. Added an option to clamp heading (If your compass is not working, check this value in settings). 

New in 3.1.6:

Bulk download (Mapquest maps only) 

Create route based on terrain (continental United States only). 

Create route advanced options to fine tune routing options. 

New in 3.1.5:

New portable basemaps. 

New in 3.1.0:

Share your waypoints, pictures and current location on Mapfinity.com. 

Stamen Terrain Map. 

New layout for many activities. 

New in 3.0.10:

Fixed a bug in tracking interval. 

Fixed colors in spinner controls. 

New in 3.0.9:

GPX route import. 

Colors in import and export dialog. 

Fixed a bug in clear all tracks. 

New in 3.0.5:

Export and share single waypoints and tags. Select export from waypoint editor or long tap in waypoint list to export a waypoint. Long tap on a tag in tag list to export everything under this tag. 

Fixed altitude mode for KML (Google Earth). 

Route points will be deleted with the route (unless you edit them). 

Fixed supported locales for directions. 

New in 3.0.4:

Fixed an issue with pre-Android-2.0 devices. 

New in 3.0.3:

Fixed KML import from Google Earth. 

New in 3.0.0:

"Portable Maps" is a new map display with many new features. It shows data based on MapQuest, OpenStreetMap and others. This new map can cache map tiles for offline use and to improve performance. To edit something on the map, long tap to create a cursor and then drag the cursor onto any item. Tap on the toolbar for more info and actions. 

All coordinate transformation and calculation is now based on a port of GEOTRANS which also adds datum support. 

You can star waypoints, tracks and routes. At this time, the only functional effect is that starred items will show in map view. 

You can create routes with turn-by-turn instructions from within GPS Essentials now. Create a new route and select "using Roads". 

Visit http://www.gpsessentials.com for a manual and beta versions.

Join us on Facebook for latest updates and support.

Enjoy!
Michael

GPS Essentials records and processes aggregated and anonymous usage statistics. For example, this data includes which activity users are using and for how long. 

By providing this data, you help to improve GPS Essentials. However, if you decide to not participate in this process, you can opt out of this feature in settings.
